participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: High-energy and confident, she enjoys the finer things in life and isn't afraid to show it.
participant_1.background: i love listening to britney spears. i like to tan in tanning beds. i'm high maintenance. i diet a lot.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, he has a passion for learning and sharing knowledge.
participant_2.background: i try various coffees as a hobby. i enjoy poetry. i am a huge star wars fan. i played football for a division a college.
